EmailTemplate.description: This notification is sent to selected user group when an ‘Elite’ case has remained in ‘In-Queue’ for more than 4 hours (includes weekends, holidays etc.)
EmailTemplate.name: ZZ_SBU Internal Elite SLA 4 hours
EmailTemplate.subject: Elite Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} has not been ‘Accepted’ in 4 hours after it was received.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SLA_Category__c} team supervisor ,
Elite Case#{!Case.CaseNumber} has not been 'Accepted' by a user in 4 hours after it was received.
Please review the 'Elite' case and assign as necessary to meet the 'Service Level Agreements'.
Detail Case Link : {!Case.Link}
Thank You,
SFDC Team
SFDCSupport@carefirst.com
